detail_desc: Straight-style jumper in a soft, textured-knit wool blend with a V-neck and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Top in soft cotton jersey with a round neckline, press-studs at the back of the neck and 3/4-length sleeves with a flounce at the cuffs.
Trousers in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a small frill trim at the top, elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and narrow elastication with a small frill trim at the hems.
Trousers in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a small frill trim at the top, elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and narrow elastication with a small frill trim at the hems.
Top in sturdy, stripe-print sweatshirt fabric in a relaxed fit with a kangaroo pocket, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Double-layered drawstring hood with a wrapover front.
Top in sweatshirt fabric decorative seams on the sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Top in sweatshirt fabric decorative seams on the sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Top in sweatshirt fabric decorative seams on the sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Double-layer jersey hats, one with an all-over print an one in a solid colour.
Choker in imitation leather with metal studs at the front and an adjustable metal press-stud fastening at the back. Width approx. 1 cm, adjustable length 30-56 cm.
Metal earrings decorated with a metal pendant in the shape of a unicorn skeleton. Length approx. 6 cm.
Cotton canvas boots with a rubber toe cap and ankle-high shaft. Lacing at the front, a loop at the back and imitation suede details. Cotton canvas linings and insoles and chunky rubber soles.
Cotton canvas boots with a rubber toe cap and ankle-high shaft. Lacing at the front, a loop at the back and imitation suede details. Cotton canvas linings and insoles and chunky rubber soles.
Top in a soft, loose knit containing glittery threads with dropped shoulders and double, flounced sleeves.
Dungaree dress in cotton twill with adjustable straps with metal fasteners, buttons down the front and at the sides and front pockets.
Dungaree dress in cotton twill with adjustable straps with metal fasteners, buttons down the front and at the sides and front pockets.
Short imitation suede skirt with an embroidered motif on the front, decorative lacing at the sides and concealed zip at the back. Lined.
Short, pleated skirt in woven fabric with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener and a zip in the side. Unlined.
Long jumper in a rib-knit viscose blend with long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Wide, block-coloured polo-neck jumper in soft, rib-knit wool containing some cashmere. Dropped shoulders and long, wide sleeves with wide, sewn-in turn-ups.
Fine-knit bolero containing some glittery threads. Buttons down the front and a flower appliqué in airy fabric.
Cardigan in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend with frills and buttons down the front.
Moss-knit cardigan in soft cotton with a single button and two pockets at the front and long sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.
T-shirt in patterned cotton piqué with a small embroidered detail at the top. Rounded collar, button placket, puff sleeves and slits at the hem.
T-shirt in patterned cotton piqué with a small embroidered detail at the top. Rounded collar, button placket, puff sleeves and slits at the hem.
T-shirt in patterned cotton piqué with a small embroidered detail at the top. Rounded collar, button placket, puff sleeves and slits at the hem.
Slightly longer-style, padded jacket with a detachable, lined hood and stand-up collar. Zip down the front, welt side pockets and ribbed cuffs. Text print on the lining.
Microfibre bralette with a lace back and mesh details. Underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, elasticated hem and no fasteners.
Microfibre bralette with a lace back and mesh details. Underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, elasticated hem and no fasteners.

Long shirt in a cotton weave with a stand-up collar, concealed press-studs on one shoulder and long sleeves with wide cuffs with a slit. Seam with an asymmetric flounce at the hem and a detachable tie belt at the waist.

Long shirt in a cotton weave with a stand-up collar, concealed press-studs on one shoulder and long sleeves with wide cuffs with a slit. Seam with an asymmetric flounce at the hem and a detachable tie belt at the waist.

Jacket in hard-washed denim with worn details and metal studs. Shoulder tabs and lapels with press-studs, a diagonal zip down the front, zipped side pockets and a small flap front pocket with a press-stud. Adjustable tabs with a press-stud at the sides and a press-stud at the cuffs. The jacket has been treated to give it a used, slightly dirty look. These effects mean that the appearance of each jacket may vary.
Short jumper in a loose knit containing some mohair with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short jumper in a loose knit containing some mohair with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short jumper in a loose knit containing some mohair with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Viscose satin top with shoulder pads, press-studs at the neck and long sleeves with a concealed zip at the cuffs.
Viscose satin top with shoulder pads, press-studs at the neck and long sleeves with a concealed zip at the cuffs.
Short, fitted jacket in woven fabric with notch lapels, a concealed hook-and-eye fastener at the front, front pockets, and long sleeves with slits at the cuffs. Lined.

Cargo shorts in cotton twill with a concealed drawstring at the waist and zip fly. Side pockets, flap back pockets with a concealed press-stud and flap leg pockets with a pleat and concealed press-stud.

Tulle skirt with appliqués and a glittery elastic waistband. Lined.
Glass water bottle with a patterned silicone grip cover, metal screw top and practical wrist strap at the top. Diameter 6.5 cm, height 21 cm.
Top in soft cotton jersey with ribbing around the neckline and cuffs, slits in the sides and long sleeves with a text print. Slightly longer at the back.
Top in soft cotton jersey with ribbing around the neckline and cuffs, slits in the sides and long sleeves with a text print. Slightly longer at the back.

Running gloves with uppers in windproof, functional fabric. Wide ribbing at the top with a reflective print. The tops of the thumb and index finger are made from touchscreen-compatible material. Unlined.
Fully lined bikini top with padded cups, wide shoulder straps that cross at the back, and a plastic fastener at the back.

V-neck blouse woven in a cotton blend with slits in the sides. Long balloon sleeves with embroidery and buttoned cuffs.
Trousers in a viscose and linen weave with a high, elasticated waist, side pockets and fake fly. Decorative tie belt at the front and tapered legs.
